chapters.title: Chapter 14: Wet Things
chapters.info: Sareitha Tomares, p. 330—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She has worn the shawl only a short time, only about two years. She grew up in Tear, and has brown hair and a dark, square face. She is among the sisters that are now sworn to obey Rand. Either she or Careane had to have been the murderess of Adeleas, and thus Black Ajah; all other suspects have been eliminated.
